Different Crime.Crime Name: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act Violation
credibility_findings: contradictions regarding pregnancies, relationship with the officer, and visits to the U.S.
judicial_review_process: judicial review of the RPD decision based on subsection 72(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
decision_outcome: application for judicial review is dismissed
Court upheld the RPD's credibility assessment
persecution_grounds: persecution by a Mexican army officer
